metadata.title: House with rainbow
metadata.longDescription: A cozy little house with many windows, a roof, and a door stands on a gently sloping lawn. A few small flowers grow on the grass. Behind the house, a huge rainbow supported by two clouds colors the sky. The weather seems crazy: behind the rainbow, a bright sun can still be seen, though partially obscured, while to one side, a cloud is raining heavy, large drops of water.

hotspots.title: Sun
hotspots.description: The sun illuminates the landscape with its rays. Only a portion of it is visible because the rainbow covers half of it.

hotspots.title: Rainbow
hotspots.description: A vast rainbow extends across almost the entire design. It features six colors. It is supported by two clouds at its extremities. Its shape is that of a semicircle.

hotspots.title: Cloud
hotspots.description: The shape of the cloud is simple, as if drawn by a child.

hotspots.title: Roof
hotspots.description: The villa's visible roof is made up of two main sections: a lateral section and a front section. Both sections are triangular in shape, giving the home a welcoming, homey feel.

hotspots.title: Lawn
hotspots.description: A large, gently sloping lawn forms the hill on which the villa rests. A few solitary daisies grow on it.

hotspots.title: Rectangular window
hotspots.description: The window is rectangular in shape and has a thick, sturdy edge on all four sides. The glass in the center is divided into four equal rectangles by two perpendicular lines.

hotspots.title: Circular window
hotspots.description: A round window occupies the facade of the house's top floor. It features a thick, sturdy frame, and its glass is divided into four equal segments by two perpendicular lines.

hotspots.title: Rain
hotspots.description: A few large drops of rain fall beneath a cloud.

hotspots.title: Flower
hotspots.description: A flower with a simple shape and a single leaf.

hotspots.title: Door
hotspots.description: A door with a round handle and rectangular shape at the base and round at the top.

hotspots.title: Wall
hotspots.description: The wall is the main part that defines the shape of the villa.
